long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Whether youâ€™re a senior aiming to keep your mind sharp, an adult looking to improve focus, or a student developing mental agility, Mega Match offers something for everyone!

Mega Match is a modern puzzle version of the traditional game â€œMemoryâ€ where you must remember tile placement on the game board. Weâ€™ve added some bells, whistles, and microsecond timers to make Mega Match more stimulating and fun to play. Score tracking allows friendly competition with family and friends, or you can play on your own to accumulate points and prepare for the upcoming Competition Mode. 

And Mega Match is free to play! No login is required either. We show you affiliate links from which we may receive a small commission. Optional in-game purchases are planned for the future, but you will always be able to play Mega Match for free by yourself or with friends and family.

Mega Match is designed to improve your mental focus and visual recognition skills using concepts like colors, time, language, and shapes to stimulate your short-term memory recall ability. Yes, playing Mega Match may actually improve your short-term memory skills.

Skills such as planning, multitasking, and attention can improve with games like Mega Match, which target these cognitive areas through structured challenges.

By regularly using your mental muscle you can achieve improvements to several cognitive skills relating to areas like subitizing, recall, working memory, visual search training, and photographic memory to name a few. 

Subitizing is the rapid enumeration of small numbers of objects, if you didnâ€™t already know!

- MEGA MATCH FEATURES  -

ğŸŒˆ Family-Friendly Content â€“ nothing explicit or threatening. Weâ€™re Grandma-approved!
â­ Fun for all ages â€“ even Granny loves beating your Mega Match score!
â­ 24+ tile sets â€“ so Grams can play with her kitties but you donâ€™t have to
ğŸš€ Fast Games â€“ perfect for short breaks to re-focus your brain
ğŸ†“ Free to Play â€“ we show you a few affiliate offers instead of charging you money
â­ Play Offline â€“ play in the car or on the airplane!
ğŸ§  Improves Memory â€“ concentration, focus, recall, recognition
ğŸ§  Prevent cognitive decline â€“ your eyes are directed connected to your brain so use them!
ğŸ‘¶ Easy to Play â€“ 5 difficulty levels ensures achievement resolution
ğŸ¥· or Hard to Play â€“ 5 difficulty levels ensures challenge accuracy
â­ Learn English numbers 1-12 with more language tiles planned
â­ Learn Spanish numbers 1-12 with more language tiles planned
â­ Scoreboard â€“ impress your friends with a screenshot of your new 2x or 3x brain size 

Install Mega Match and start your brain training routine today!

Some Science Behind Brain Training:

    â€¢ Alzheimerâ€™s Prevention: Regular mental exercises, like Mega Match, may help reduce the risk of Alzheimerâ€™s Disease by keeping the brain active and improving neural connections.
    â€¢ Mind Maintenance for Seniors: Engaging in brain training can help older adults preserve cognitive functions, making it easier to stay independent and enjoy daily life.
    â€¢ "The ACTIVE Study" (Willis et. al. 2006) was a landmark study showing significant cognitive benefits from targeted brain training, including enhanced problem-solving, memory retention, and improved daily functioning.



By using the Mega Match browser extension, you agree to the terms and conditions.

Mega Match is a modern puzzle version of the traditional game â€œMemoryâ€ where you must remember where various tiles are placed on the board. Weâ€™ve added some bells, whistles, and microsecond timers to make Mega Match more stimulating and fun to play. 

Score tracking allows friendly competition with family and friends, or you can play on your own to accumulate points and prepare for the upcoming Competition Mode. 

And Mega Match is absolutely free to play! 

No login is required. Optional in-game purchases are planned for the future, but you will always be able to play Mega Match for free by yourself or with friends and family.

Mega Match is designed to improve your mental focus and visual recognition skills using concepts like colors, time, language, and shapes to stimulate your short term memory recall ability. Yes, playing Mega Match may actually improve your short term memory skills.

- MEGA MATCH FEATURES  -

ğŸŒˆ Family-Friendly Content â€“ no explicit content. Weâ€™re Grandma-approved!
â­ Fun for all ages â€“ even Grandma loves beating your Mega Match score
â­ 20+ tile sets â€“ more on the way so Grams can play with her kitties but you donâ€™t have to
ğŸš€ Fast Games â€“ most levels are completed in under a minute, perfect for short breaks to re-focus your brain
ğŸ†“ Free to Play â€“ we show you a few affiliate offers instead of charging you money
â­ Play Offline â€“ play in the car or on the airplane!
ğŸ§  Improves Memory â€“ concentration, focus, recall, recognition
ğŸ‘¶ Easy to Play â€“ 5 difficulty levels ensures achievement resolution
ğŸ¥· Hard to Play â€“ 5 difficulty levels ensures challenge accuracy
â­ Learn numbers 1-12 in Spanish â€“ More language learning tiles are planned
â­ Learn numbers 1-12 in English â€“ More language learning tiles are planned
â­ Scoreboard â€“ impress your friends, or else take selfies of your new 2x or 3x brain size 
â­ Full Credits are available from the in-game menu
ğŸ¤º 2025 Update Roadmap includes Competition Mode

Install Mega Match now from the Chrome Web Store!
